Package cams.replier

Class ReplierUI

java.lang.Object
cams.replier.ReplierUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
DashboardState, PostReplierUI, PostViewerUI
public class ReplierUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements PostReplierUI
Abstract class representing the user interface for replying to enquiries, a specific type of post. This class provides a UI with abstracted logic for the action of replying to enquiries, including displaying a menu to choose an enquiry to reply to, and handling the user interaction. It implements PostReplierUI

  • Method Details

    • display

      public void display​(Dashboard dashboard)
      Displays the replierController menu to the user and allows the user to select an enquiry to reply to. Subsequently, the method facilitates the reply process. If there are no enquiries, it redirects back to the main menu of the dashboard.
      Specified by:
      display in interface DashboardState
      Parameters:
      dashboard - The dashboard through which the user interacts.

    • initializeActions

      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​MenuAction> initializeActions​(Dashboard dashboard, int numEnquiries)
      Initialises a hashmap of methods corresponding to each choice in the user menu
      Parameters:
      dashboard - The dashboard object
      numEnquiries - The number of enquiries that the user has submitted
      Returns:
      Hash map of methods keyed to menu choices

    • describeOptions

      protected void describeOptions​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​MenuAction> actions)
      Displays the corresponding description of each menu choice
      Parameters:
      actions - Hash map of methods keyed to menu choices

    • replyEnquiry

      protected void replyEnquiry​(User user, int numEnquiries)
      Method that gets user input for replying an enquiry
      Parameters:
      user - The current authenticated user replying
      numEnquiries - The user's total number of enquiries to reply

    • reply

      public boolean reply​(User user, int postIndex, java.lang.String reply)
      Replies to a specific enquiry.
      Specified by:
      reply in interface PostReplierUI
      Parameters:
      user - The user performing the reply.
      postIndex - The index of the post to reply to.
      reply - The reply content.
      Returns:
      true if the reply was successful, false otherwise.

    • view

      public int view​(User user)
      Displays the enquiries of the user to reply to and returns the count of those enquiries. Each enquiry is displayed with its index and content.
      Specified by:
      view in interface PostViewerUI
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose enquiries to reply to are to be displayed.
      Returns:
      The number of enquiries displayed.
